Judul: ESTIMATING CORPORATE VALUE OF PT. X: A CONSTRUCTION AND FABRICATION COMPANY
Abstrak: The economic development of Indonesia has been growing in the last decades. The development must be followed by the development of infrastructure in order to support the economic development. The development stimulates the company which moves in infrastructure to compete to become the best in the business industry. From the research that already done, it answers the questions that the range of value of PT. X is from IDR 59,981,943,367 to IDR 119,976,586,341. However, X has to increase the cash flow from the existing investments, increase the future growth, increase the length of future high-growth, and reduce cost of financing.
